./mvnw quarkus:add-extension -Dextensions="<extension ref>, <extension ref>"
# ref -> see above, e.g.:
# ./mvnw quarkus:add-extension -Dextensions="quarkus-vertx, quarkus-qute"
# remove
# ./mvnw quarkus:remove-extension -Dextensions=""

Troubleshooting 

"[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus:quarkus-maven-plugin:1.11.5.Final:add-extension (default-cli) on project <project name>: Unable to update the pom.xml file: Unable to add extensions ->"

=>probably missing comma for extension separation
